metadata.synopsis: Jaheira yells to her Harpers and Flaming Fist to hold the main floor of Moonrise after the player has cleared the enemies during the assault. This is the last push before confronting Ketheric on the roof.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe mooassault_alive 1Talke to Jaheira oe mooassault_cleartower

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Hold every exit - let none escape to warn the army of our assault.

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Hold this floor, Harpers! Let none escape the tower. We're about to trap the spider in its own web.

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: We've taken the tower. No doubt its master waits to greet us above.

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: Harpers - hold this floor. Let none escape to warn the army - not until we've put Ketheric down.
